page.t: Allows you to mine and sell a single resource within a radius of 1 to 4 sectors depending on your piloting or management skills.
Allows you to trade by buying and selling a single resource within a radius of 1 to 4 sectors depending on your piloting or management skills.

Allows you to mine and sell multiple resources within 1 to 4 sectors, depending on your piloting or management skills. If you select more mineable resources than allowed, only the first ones will be used.

Allows you to trade by buying and selling multiple resources within a radius of 1 to 4 sectors depending on your piloting or management skills. If you select more wares than allowed, only the first wares up to your maximum will be used.
Allows you to trade by buying and selling multiple wares within a radius of up to 15 sectors depending on your piloting or management skills.
